text: Alysia Yeoh is a fictional character created by writer Gail Simone for the Batgirl published by DC Comics. == Fictional character biography == She is Barbara Gordon’s best friend and a transgender woman. She was seen as the first major transgender character written in a mainstream comic book.Kane, Matt (April 10, 2013). "'Batgirl' Comic Introduces Transgender Character" . GLAAD. The first ever transgender wedding premiered in Batgirl #45.https://www.outfrontmagazine.com/culture/batgirl-features-major-comics- first-transgender-wedding/ ‘BATGIRL’ FEATURES MAJOR COMICS’ FIRST TRANSGENDER WEDDING == In other media == The character was going to make her live-action movie debut in the DC Extended Universe movie Batgirl, played by Ivory Aquino. ==References== Category:DC Comics characters Category:Fictional LGBT people
title: Alysia Yeoh
